name: Azadi Tower
description: The Azadi Tower (Persian: برج آزادی, Borj-e Āzādi; 'Freedom Tower'), formerly known as the Shahyad Tower (برج شهیاد, Borj-e Šahyād; 'Shah's Memorial Tower'), is a monument located on Azadi Square in Tehran, Iran. It is one of the landmarks of Tehran, marking the west entrance to the city, and is part of the Azadi Cultural Complex, which also includes an underground museum. [wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Azadi_Tower)
